# Widget User Manual

Welcome to the Widget User Manual.

## Installation

### Prerequisites

You need Node.js version 20 or higher.

### Download

Download the latest package from the repository.
The installer will handle all dependencies automatically.

## Configuration

Edit `config.json` to set your preferences.

### Display Options

Available display modes: dark, light, auto.

### Network Settings

Configure proxy settings if behind a firewall.

## Troubleshooting

If the widget fails to start, check the log file at `~/.widget/debug.log`.
